verses.verse: <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G1135>"Woman,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> does that <S%G2532>have<s%> to do <S%G2532>with<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> and <S%G1698>me?<s%> <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2240>has<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G2240>come.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> water <S%G5201>pots<s%> of <S%G3035>stone<s%> <S%G2749>set<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> after the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>' way <S%G2596>of<s%> <S%G2512>purifying,<s%> <S%G5562>containing<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3355>metretes<s%> <S%G303>apiece.<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1072>"Fill<s%> the water <S%G5201>pots<s%> with <S%G5204>water.<s%>" <S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G1072>filled<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> up <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G507>brim.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3568>"Now<s%> draw some <S%G501>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5342>take<s%> it to the ruler of the <S%G755>feast.<s%>" <S%G2532>So<s%> they took <S%G5342>it.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>When<s%> the ruler of the <S%G755>feast<s%> <S%G1089>tasted<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> now <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4159>where<s%> it came <S%G2076>from<s%> <S%G1161>(but<s%> the <S%G1249>servants<s%> who had <S%G501>drawn<s%> the <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%>), the ruler of the <S%G755>feast<s%> <S%G5455>called<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G444>"Everyone<s%> <S%G5087>serves<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the guests have <S%G3184>drunk<s%> <S%G5119>freely,<s%> then that which is <S%G1640>worse.<s%> <S%G4771>You<s%> have <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G3631>the<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> those who <S%G4453>sold<s%> <S%G1016>oxen,<s%> <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4058>doves,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the changers of <S%G2773>money<s%> <S%G2521>sitting.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G5416>whip<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4979>cords,<s%> and <S%G1544>threw<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> the <S%G1016>oxen;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he poured <S%G1632>out<s%> the <S%G2855>changers<s%>' <S%G2772>money,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G390>overthrew<s%> their <S%G5132>tables.<s%>

<S%G2532>To<s%> those who <S%G4453>sold<s%> the <S%G4058>doves,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G142>"Take<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> out of <S%G1782>here!<s%> <S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>'s <S%G3624>house<s%> <S%G3624>a<s%> <S%G1712>marketplace!<s%>"

The <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> do <S%G1166>you<s%> show <S%G2254>us,<s%> seeing <S%G3754>that<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> these <S%G5023>things?<s%>"

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> he was <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3415>remembered<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4100>believed<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2036>said.<s%>
